Situation - The American Enterprise Institute's (AEI) Values & Capitalism Project equips thought leaders to make the moral case for free markets. AEI came to Polymath asking for help with telling its story, and detrmining how best to develop and package course materials for students and professors.

Action - Our deep pedagogical and technological expertise has resulted in a long relationship with AEI. Polymath has developed websites, classroom slide decks, professor lecture notes, and high-end videos to provoke discussion. The success of this project has led to an ever-deepening partnership.

Result - The website has been a runaway success for AEI. Professors rave about the online curriculum and the site is growing in users adn content. Josh Good of AEI wrote tos ay, "Polymath's products are high-quality and visually-compelling. They grasped our core message. The Polymath team... worked quickly and creatively through obstacles... going the extra mile to bring us the best possible result... To influence the ever-changing digital landscape, we strongly recommend Polymath Innovations."
